body: @apaszke The graph should already be freed at `.backward()`. Also, I believe the code @Smerity uses packs the forward+backward in a [function call](https://github.com/Smerity/examples/blob/wlm_memory_bug/word_language_model/main.py#L178). Could it be an issue of [`repackage_hidden`](https://github.com/Smerity/examples/blob/wlm_memory_bug/word_language_model/main.py#L158)? IIRC, "detach" a variable using `Variable(var.data)` is not encouraged.
